short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will hide the outcome of boxing matches on Boxrec boxer pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you visit a boxer's page on Boxrec.com, the results of the boxer's matches (ie result: "W", decision: "UD", and rounds: "10/12") will be hidden by a "Blocked" button. The referees, judges, titles, and knockdown summary will be hidden by a "Show Results" button.

Click the individual button to show the respective results. 

Refresh the page to restore the hide buttons.

Note: This only works for the individual boxer pages on Boxrec.com, not the main pages, ratings pages, etc.
